I'd like to talk about my beard and how it has been a part of my life.

participant_2.background:
I went on a family road trip across the country with my sons in my minivan.
I’m excited to start my new internship and learn more about construction.
i m taking online classes.
i listen to music for more than 5 hours a day.
My favorite thing to do on the weekends is to wear my band t-shirts and relax by watching foreign films.

content.text: Hi, I'm interested in hearing about your road trip!
It was a lot of fun! We took our minivan and drove from California to Florida.
Wow, that's a long drive! How many days did it take?
It took us about 4 days. We stopped at a lot of different places along the way.
What was the best part of the trip?
I think the best part was spending time with my family. We had a lot of fun together.
That sounds really nice. I'm glad you had a good time.
Thanks! What are some of your hobbies?
I like to go for walks with my dog, and I also like to listen to music.
I love dogs! I have a golden retriever puppy.
Oh, that's so cute! I had a golden retriever when I was a kid.
They're the best dogs! What's your favorite band?
I like a lot of different bands, but my favorite is probably The Beatles.
The Beatles are great! I love their music.
Me too! They're one of the best bands of all time.
